code: import axios from"axios";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import config from"../config.js";export const getAllQueries=async()=>{let dataToSend=[],err=undefined;try{const data=await axios.get(config.getAllQueriesUrl());dataToSend=data.data;}catch(error){err=error;}return{data:dataToSend,err:err};};export const createQuery=async data=>{try{await axios.post(config.getCreateQueryUrl(),data);toast.success("Message send!");return true;}catch(error){console.log(error);toast.error("Something went wrong!");}return false;};export const deleteQuery=async id=>{try{await axios.delete(config.querydeleteUrl(id));toast.success("Deleted!");return true;}catch(error){console.log(error);toast.error("Something went wrong!");}return false;};
